summary: 2004 JEEP GRAND  CHEROKEE.  CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO REPLACEMENT PARTS NOT AVAILABLE TO REPAIR OCCUPANT RESTRAINT CONTROL MODULE RECALL NOTICE.  *LD    THE CONSUMER REQUESTED INFORMATION CONCERNING A RECALL FOR THE OCCUPANT RESTRAINT CONTROL MODULE. THE CONSUMER RECEIVED 4 RECALL NOTICES AND ATTEMPTED TO HAVE THE VEHICLE REPAIRED AT 3 DIFFERENT DEALERS.  UPDATED 09/5/2017*JS
